TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SessionEndingEventHandler(object sender, SessionEndingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SessionEndingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SessionEndingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SessionEndingEventArgs)
public delegate void SessionEndingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SessionEndingEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: Cuando este evento lo provoca la clase , este objeto siempre es .

span.span: When this event is raised by the class, this object is always .

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento desde el sistema operativo.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event from the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento con el método de control de eventos, agregue una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Se llama al método de control de eventos cada vez que se produce el evento, a menos que se quite al delegado.The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
